feed.title: Gaurav Gyawali
feed.subtitle: I am Gaurav Gyawali, and this is my blog. I am a physics PhD student at Cornell University. I am interested in almost everything including quantum computing, theoretical condensed matter, buddhism studies, philosophy and so on.

entry.title: छुवाछुत्
entry.summary: जसले अफ्ना सन्तानको आङ् नाङ्गै राखी तिम्रो लुगा सिउँछ, जसले आफ्नो बुढो हड्डी खियाई आरनमा तिम्रा औजार पिट्दछ, उसैलाइ भन्छौ तिमी तँ तल्लो जातको अछुत, तैँले छोएको पानी चल्दैन । जसले आफ्ना...
